CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.label: compound steel
CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.description: Steel compounding grinds the world to a crawl. Muscles resist motion, limbs feel heavy, and each step takes effort â€” but every second, speed floods into the metalmind. With patience and pain, the Allomancer becomes a storm waiting to be unleashed.
